description: This is a Dart source file defining the main application router component for a Flutter healthcare management app. It manages navigation between authentication and main app screens, including bottom navigation and authentication flows.

classes.name: AppRouter
classes.description: Root widget that manages navigation between authentication and main application sections.

classes.name: _AppRouterState
classes.description: State class for AppRouter, manages current selected tab and builds corresponding view.

classes.name: _AuthFlow
classes.description: Widget managing the login/register authentication toggle interface.

classes.name: _AuthFlowState
classes.description: State class for _AuthFlow, manages current tab (login or register).

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the state object for AppRouter widget.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for AppRouter, showing authentication flow or main app screens based on auth state.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the state object for _AuthFlow widget.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for _AuthFlow, providing toggle between login and registration screens.
